MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY9 postcode area of Leven. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:10pm. Our engineers are on their way to the local substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:27pm on Saturday, 31 October 2020
